i.name: An Acquired Taste
i.description: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks and abilities, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of An Acquired Taste. At three stacks, he can use Devour on an enemy champion.

q.name: Tongue Lash
q.description: Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit. This ability gains a stun after three stacks of An Acquired Taste.

w.name: Devour
w.description: Tahm Kench devours a target, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. He can spit devoured minions and monsters out as a skillshot that deals magic damage in an area upon impact.

e.name: Thick Skin
e.description: Tahm Kench turns incoming damage into gray health. As gray health decays, Tahm Kench is healed for a percentage of the gray health amount. When activated, this ability turns all gray health into a shield.

r.name: Abyssal Voyage
r.description: Tahm Kench teleports across the map, and he may bring one ally champion with him.

i1.blurb: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks and abilities, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of An Acquired Taste. At three stacks, he can use Devour on an enemy champion.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Tahm Kench's''' [[basic attack]]s and {{ai|Tongue Lash|Tahm Kench}} deal {{as|{{pp|3|key=%|showtype=true|1.25 to 1.75|1 to 13}} of his '''maximum''' health}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}. Against enemy [[champion]]s they also apply ''An Acquired Taste'' stack for 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, which increase the damage by the same amount per stack up to a total damage of {{as|{{pp|3|key=%|showtype=true|1.25*3 to 1.75*3|1 to 13}}|health}}. The stacks decay once every {{fd|0.67}} seconds after the stacks reach the full duration.
{{ai|Tongue Lash|Tahm Kench}} and {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench}} gain additional effects against enemies with three stacks.
i1.name: An Acquired Taste
notes: * By calculating ''An Acquired Taste's'' base damage, using '''Tahm Kench's''' base health, we can define ''An Acquired Taste's'' damage in a different way:

riot.name: An Acquired Taste
riot.description: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks and abilities, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of An Acquired Taste. At three stacks, he can use Devour on an enemy champion.

riot.name: Tongue Lash
riot.description: Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit. This ability gains a stun after three stacks of An Acquired Taste.
riot.tooltip:
Damage the first enemy hit for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }}s. Champions with 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste will additionally be stunned for {{ e6 }}s.

Activate Devour while your tongue is in midair to devour monsters/minions from a distance.

q1.blurb: Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit. This ability gains a stun after three stacks of An Acquired Taste.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a brief delay, '''Tahm Kench''' lashes his tongue in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
During ''Tongue Lash'', {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench}} can be cast {{sti|mana|{{as|for free|mana}}}} to devour enemy [[minion]]s or non-epic [[monster]]s from a distance.
Enemy champions with three {{ai|An Acquired Taste|Tahm Kench}} stacks are {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
q1.name: Tongue Lash
notes: * {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench}} can be 'queued' at any point during ''Tongue Lash'' (including the wind-up animation) and will not go on cooldown if ''Tahm Kench'' fails to hit a valid target with ''Tongue Lash''.

riot.name: Devour
riot.description: Tahm Kench devours a target, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. He can spit devoured minions and monsters out as a skillshot that deals magic damage in an area upon impact.
riot.tooltip:
Devour a target for {{ e1 }}s (half that for enemy champions.) Enemies are dealt {{ e3 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of their maximum health as magic damage (maximum of {{ e2 }} against neutral monsters).

Enemy Champions: Requires 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste to be devoured. While holding an enemy champion, Tahm Kench is slowed by 95%.

Minions and Monsters: Reactivate to spit them, dealing {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to targets hit.

When used on an enemy, half of Devour's cooldown is refunded.

w1.blurb: Tahm Kench devours a target, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. He can spit devoured minions and monsters out as a skillshot that deals magic damage in an area upon impact.
w1.cooldown: {{tt|{{ap|28|25|22|19|16}}|Starts after the unit has left Tahm Kench's belly.}}
description: {{sbc|First Cast – Devour:}} '''Tahm Kench''' swallows an enemy minion, non-epic monster or allied champion, making them {{tip|untargetable}} and unable to take any actions for 4 seconds.

'''Tahm Kench''' can swallow an enemy champion if they have three {{ai|An Acquired Taste|Tahm Kench}} stacks {{tip|slow|slowing}} himself by 95%. Swallowing a targeted enemy champion only lasts for half the duration, down to 2 seconds, consumes all their ''An Acquired Taste'' stacks, {{tip|suppression|suppresses}}, {{tip|nearsight|nearsights}} and makes them {{tip|untargetable}}.
Swallowing an enemy refunds {{sti|cooldown|50% of the cooldown}}.
After 1 second, ''Devour'' can be recast into {{ai|Regurgitate|Tahm Kench}} while '''Tahm Kench's''' belly is full. Allied champions can exit at will after the same delay.
w1.name: Devour
notes: * The {{tip|slow|self-slow}} is affected by [[slow resist]].
* ''Devour'' deals 1 magic damage from {{ai|An Acquired Taste|Tahm Kench}}.
* ''Devour'' will prioritize champions (cannot be used on those who are [[channel]]ing an ability) over minions.
** If champions stay on top of each other it will prioritize those who stay beneath.
* ''Tahm Kench'' cannot use {{si|Teleport}}, {{si|Flash}}, or {{ai|Dark Passage|Thresh}} while holding an enemy champion in his belly (he can when holding an allied champion or minion).

* ''Devour'' cannot be used on epic monsters ({{ui|Blue Sentinel}}, {{ui|Red Brambleback}}, {{ui|Vilemaw}}, {{ui|Rift Herald}}, {{ui|Dragon}}, {{ui|Baron Nashor}}) and on {{ci|Sion}} during his {{ai|Glory in Death|Sion}}.

* ''Devour'' will not interrupt persistent area-of-effect abilities ({{ai|Glacial Storm|Anivia}},{{ai|Slicing Maelstrom|Kennen}}, {{ai|Burnout|Shyvana}}) non-channeled ones ({{ai|The Culling|Lucian}}, {{ai|Center of the Universe|Aurelion Sol}}, {{ai|Celestial Expansion|Aurelion Sol}}) damage over time ({{si|Ignite}}) or delayed single-target damage ({{ai|Death Mark|Zed}}) but will interrupt the delayed area-of-effect kind ({{ai|Explosive Charge|Tristana}}).
* {{ii|Quicksilver Sash}} will cleanse ''Devour's'' {{tip|suppression}} but the damage will still be dealt.

riot.name: Devour
riot.description: Tahm Kench devours a target, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. He can spit devoured minions and monsters out as a skillshot that deals magic damage in an area upon impact.
riot.tooltip:
Devour a target for {{ e1 }}s (half that for enemy champions.) Enemies are dealt {{ e3 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of their maximum health as magic damage (maximum of {{ e2 }} against neutral monsters).

Enemy Champions: Requires 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste to be devoured. While holding an enemy champion, Tahm Kench is slowed by 95%.

Minions and Monsters: Reactivate to spit them, dealing {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to targets hit.

When used on an enemy, half of Devour's cooldown is refunded.

w2.blurb: Tahm Kench devours a target, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. He can spit devoured minions and monsters out as a skillshot that deals magic damage in an area upon impact.
description: {{sbc|Second Cast – Regurgitate:}} '''Tahm Kench''' regurgitates the swallowed target. If they are an enemy, they are {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|0.25}} seconds and take {{as|magic damage}}, capped against monsters.

Minions and non-epic monsters are spat forth, stopping if they hit an enemy or terrain, and dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies around them and themselves before taking ''Regurgitate's'' damage. Allied champions are also spat out stopping if they hit an enemy, while enemy champions are regurgitated in front of '''Tahm Kench'''.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|20 to 32}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Maximum Monster Damage|{{ap|400 to 600}}}}
w2.name: Regurgitate
notes: * {{ii|Quicksilver Sash}} will cleanse ''Devour's'' {{tip|suppression}} but the damage will still be dealt.
* ''Regurgitate'' can send allies to the other side of small walls.

riot.name: Thick Skin
riot.description: Tahm Kench turns incoming damage into gray health. As gray health decays, Tahm Kench is healed for a percentage of the gray health amount. When activated, this ability turns all gray health into a shield.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: {{ e3 }}% of the Damage taken while this ability is not cooling down is converted to gray health. If allowed to decay, {{ e2 }}% of gray health will turn back into health.

Active: Convert all of your gray health into a shield that lasts {{ e1 }} seconds.

e1.blurb: Tahm Kench turns incoming damage into gray health. As gray health decays, Tahm Kench is healed for a percentage of the gray health amount. When activated, this ability turns all gray health into a shield.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Tahm Kench''' stores a percentage of the damage he takes as ''Grey Health'' on his {{as|health bar}}.

While ''Thick Skin'' is not on cooldown, and after taking no damage for {{tt|{{fd|2.5}}|Estimated}} seconds, '''Tahm Kench''' rapidly {{tip|heals}} for a portion of his ''Grey Health'' over time, consuming it in the process.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Tahm Kench''' converts his current ''Grey Health'' into a {{tip|shield}} that lasts for 3 seconds.
leveling: {{st|Total Health Restored|{{ap|15 to 35}}% of ''Grey Health''|Health Restored from Damage|{{as|{{pp|5|notooltip=true|(15+5*(x-1))/100*(70+5*(x-1))}}%|health}}}}
e1.name: Thick Skin
notes: * The cooldown starts when the spell is casted.

* ''Thick Skin'' shield value and ''Grey Health'' percentage heal are both boosted by effects that increase heal and shield power. This means you can technically heal more than the normal amount of ''Grey Health'' and get a shield bigger than your maximum health.
* As [[true damage]] is converted into ''Grey Health'' the same as all other post-mitigation damage, ''Thick Skin'' effectively grants ''Tahm Kench'' a form of true damage mitigation.

riot.name: Abyssal Voyage
riot.description: Tahm Kench teleports across the map, and he may bring one ally champion with him.
riot.tooltip:
Begin to channel for up to 6 seconds. During this time, one ally champion can right click Tahm Kench to join in. Alternatively, reactivate this ability to travel alone. On reactivation or once an ally has opted in, Tahm travels to the target location.

Taking damage from champions cancels the channel.
Allies in combat with champions cannot take Abyssal Voyage.

r1.blurb: Tahm Kench teleports across the map, and he may bring one ally champion with him.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tahm Kench''' {{tip|channels}} for up to 6 seconds, highlighting the path to his intended destination to allied champions while opening his maw to offer up to one of them the chance to come with him. If an ally has climbed in, '''Tahm Kench''' automatically begins a {{tt|1|Estimated}} second channel.

After a {{fd|0.25}}-second delay, '''Tahm Kench''' can reactivate {{ai|Abyssal Voyage 2|Tahm Kench|Abyssal Voyage}} to begin the channel without an ally. Once the channel is completed, '''Tahm Kench''', and the ally that has climbed in if there is any, {{tip|blink}} to the target location, arriving after a {{tt|{{fd|0.5}}|Estimated.}}-second delay.

Taking damage or cancelling the channel interrupts ''Abyssal Voyage'', putting it on a {{sti|cooldown|10 second cooldown}}. ''Abyssal Voyage'' cannot be activated while '''Tahm Kench''' has a {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench|full belly}}.
r1.flavortext: Boy, the world's one river, and I'm its king. Ain't no place I ain't been; ain't no place I can't go again.
r1.name: Abyssal Voyage
notes: * Allies may still join '''Tahm Kench''' by clicking him while he performs ''Abyssal Voyage's'' second cast's animation.
* Allies in combat with enemy champions cannot jump into ''Abyssal Voyage''.

riot.name: Abyssal Voyage
riot.description: Tahm Kench teleports across the map, and he may bring one ally champion with him.
riot.tooltip:
Begin to channel for up to 6 seconds. During this time, one ally champion can right click Tahm Kench to join in. Alternatively, reactivate this ability to travel alone. On reactivation or once an ally has opted in, Tahm travels to the target location.

Taking damage from champions cancels the channel.
Allies in combat with champions cannot take Abyssal Voyage.

Taking damage or cancelling the channel interrupts ''Abyssal Voyage'', putting it on a {{sti|cooldown|10 second cooldown}}. ''Abyssal Voyage'' cannot be activated while '''Tahm Kench''' has a {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench|full belly}}.
